description:
Glameow finds Team Rocket`s Meowth unconscious behind a rock and she helps it get better. Meowth wakes up and instantly falls in love with Mamie`s Glameow. They have lunch together as Jessie and James appear and thank Mamie for helping Meowth as they drag him away from Mamie`s Glameow.
Meowth decides that he wants Team Rocket to capture Glameow to give it to the boss but his ulterior motive is to run away with Glameow. Meowth and Glameow spend some time together as he tries to convince and charm her but Ash and his friends manage to track Meowth down.
During a battle, Mamie`s Glameow evolves into Purugly. Meowth loses interest and allows Mamie and her Purugly to continue on their journey together.
name: Nyarmar (Mamii)
